articles.description: A new store is set to take over a unit at Hempstead Valley next spring.
articles.content:
A second charity shop is set to open in an out-of-town shopping centre.
The British Heart Foundation is finalising details to take over a unit at Hempstead Valley in Gillingham next spring.

articles.title: Race to the metaverse: The fight to shape the future of the internet - Sky News
articles.content:
